title: Club tag Glitch
body: My club doesnt load it says "joining..." and it doesnt load and i tried in different pcs and it still dont work :/ Please help i cant leave or even set a club tag and i have 5 friends :/ im the 5th one :l help pls need club tag <'3

replies.body: This does sound like a strange issue, and it's interesting that the situation remains the same on different devices.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so we can dig in and take a deeper look.  We'll see what's going on, and will respond to your ticket asap!
I can send you screenshots on what's happening sorry for late replay didnt check this thing tho
Dammit i logged on my phone and i forgot to change the server xx

I think its because i had a club tag in eune and i didnt leave it or make someone the owner, so i changed to EUW and made a club maybe thats why, BTW when i logged on my second account my name was "*summoner........" i can send u a screenshot if u wanted :3 {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} (UPDATE) i had to make 6 people join the club to creat a club tag (6with me) i guess it doesnt count me in the club? And sorry ffor my bad english
